page.title: 07INTERVIEW WITH THE HEAD
page.content: {Q What has been the most noticeable {change in the school during your time? A The most noticeable change has been the attitude of the children towards their friends and teachers. Another change is the increase in the number of pupils from 500, when I first came here ,to over 800 pupils. {Q Has there been any additional {buildings? A Yes, the woodwork and metalwork rooms were opened in 1960 and the craft and technical drawing room in 1972. Since then there has been no additions except mobile classrooms. {Q What about new subjects?} A Many new subjects have been introduced,German,Economics and Computer Appreciation. A new T.V.E.I scheme will introduce Electronics, Media Studies,Rural Tourism and Wordprocessing.
